department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
short_summary: To retain an engineering consulting firm as the Prime Consultant for the provision of services required for this project. Projects include:  replacement of the Bronson Channel Bridge, Power Channel Bridge rehabilitation, and boxing Channel culvert rehabilitation.
description: The project includes three major works: the construction of a new structure, the repair/replacement of an existing one, and the rehabilitation of an existing structure. The main goals are related to engineering and providing maintenance services.
full_summary:
## EH990-240686 Southern Structures Renewal Project

*ID:* WS4360910854-Doc4363093595  *revision:* 7
*Tender Reference:* WS4360910854
*Tender publication date:* 2023-12-21 | Tender closing date: 2024-02-20 14:00:00

### Overview
This government tender announcement for Psychological [that said structure but i think structure sounds better there] Renewal Project aims to retain a firms providing professional engineering services, based in Canada.

### Project Overview
This project involves three major components:

1. Replacement of the Bronson Channel Bridge
2. Rehabilitation of the Power Channel Bridge
3. Rehabilitation of the Buchanan Channel Culvert

The largest and most complex work falls under the replacement of the Bronson Channel Bridge project. Our services will encompass multidisciplinary roles including parts of worked on that one environment outside of an institution continental decided system of bridge channel starting implement on consultation!
